about_the_game:
Little Wings Deliveries

Embark on a playful adventure with your cozy flying ship. Traverse through floating islands, chat with new friends, and make deliveries. Plan out your routes and find secrets while enjoying the beautiful landscape. As your lungs are filled with air, connect with yourself and discover your compass.

Attention: This game is digestable 😋🍴

We're a small collective of game makers, making lots of creative and 'digestable' games. Digestable game respects its players' money and time, designed around a single idea, and doesn't overstays its welcome. We'd like you to be able to finish our games just in couple of sessions, without ever feeling "stuffed" so to say.

Little Features:

  • ☁️ Sail through clouds with your flying ship!

  • 🏝️ Explore 5 different tiny flying islands!

  • 📦 Deliver total of 10 items!

  • 💨 Repair broken windmills to change the wind's direction and plan your own route!

  • 🤪 Meet with small cast of quirky characters!

  • 📍 Collect some cool pins to attach to your bag! 

  • ⏰ Around 30 minutes to 1 hours of playtime!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Little Wings Deliveries

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (or later)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a playful adventure with your cozy flying ship. Traverse through floating islands, chat with new friends, and make deliveries. Plan out your routes and find secrets while enjoying the beautiful landscape. As your lungs are filled with air, connect with yourself and discover your compass.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
